could-not-upload-save.check-logs: Couldn't upload the save to the cloud, check the logs for more info.
could-not-backup-purge.check-logs: Couldn't purge the backups, check the logs for more info.
failed-backup-save.overwrite: Failed to backup the existing save on the cloud, do you want to overwrite it anyway?
messages.other.wait-upload-finish: Please wait until the save finishes uploading.
messages.other.wait-upload-finish-before: Please wait until the save finishes uploading before deleting it.
messages.home-view-model.need-select-ext: Please select and configure a cloud provider extension first.
messages.home-view-model.extension-not-i: The selected extension "{{extension}}" is not installed or loaded.
messages.home-view-model.failed-retrieve: Failed to retrieve the api for the selected extension "{{extension}}".
messages.home-view-model.need-open-setti: Please open the extension settings and authenticate with the cloud provider.
ui.local-saves-view.title: Local Saves
messages.local-saves-view-model.failed-r: Couldn't retrieve the local saves, check the logs for more info.
messages.local-saves-view-model.could-no: Couldn't retrieve some of the local saves, check the logs for more info.
messages.local-saves-view-model.save-alr: The save is already being uploaded, please wait for the upload to finish.
messages.local-saves-view-model.could-no: Couldn't check if there is an existing save on the cloud with more progress, do you want to continue?
messages.local-saves-view-model.cloud-sa: There is an existing save with more days played on the cloud ({{cloudDays}}), do you want to overwrite it ({{localDays}}) ?
messages.local-saves-view-model.failed-b: Failed to backup the existing save on the cloud, do you want to overwrite it anyway?
messages.local-saves-view-model.failed-u: Failed to upload the save to the cloud.
ui.cloud-saves-view.title: Cloud Saves
messages.cloud-saves-view-model.failed-r: Couldn't retrieve the saves from the cloud, Check the logs for more info.
messages.cloud-saves-view-model.could-no: Couldn't retrieve some of the cloud saves, check the logs for more info.
messages.cloud-saves-view-model.exit-cur: Please exit the current save before downloading.
messages.cloud-saves-view-model.save-upl: Please wait for the save upload to finish.
messages.cloud-saves-view-model.could-no: Couldn't check if there is an existing save locally with more progress, do you want to continue?
messages.cloud-saves-view-model.local-sa: There is an existing save with more days played locally ({{localDays}}), do you want to overwrite it ({{cloudDays}}) ?
messages.cloud-saves-view-model.failed-d: Couldn't download the save, check the logs for more info.
messages.cloud-saves-view-model.could-no: Couldn't delete the existing save, check the logs for more info.
messages.cloud-saves-view-model.save-dow: The save was downloaded, but an error occured while overwriting the save settings, check the logs for more info.
messages.cloud-saves-view-model.settings: An error occured while overwriting the save settings, the save got deleted.
ui.settings-view.setting.auto-upload.too: Automatically upload the current save when the player sleeps
ui.settings-view.setting.backup-saves.to: Backup old saves on the cloud before uploading the current save
ui.settings-view.setting.purge-backups.t: Delete old backups on the cloud on startup
ui.settings-view.setting.backups-to-keep: The number of backups to keep on the cloud when purging backups
ui.settings-view.setting.overwrite-save-: Overwrites the save settings after downloading it, using the GlobalConfigSettings mod instead of this would be a better option
messages.settings-view-model.failed-load: Couldn't load the api for the selected extension.
messages.settings-view-model.failed-purg: Couldn't purge backups, please sign in first.
Couldn't purge backups, check the logs for more info.
